content:
TITLE: Cloning and Setting Up Create Block Theme Repository for Development in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Commands to fork, clone, and configure the Create Block Theme repository for development. Sets up the upstream connection to the main WordPress repository for staying in sync with the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME/create-block-theme.git
cd create-block-theme
git remote add upstream https://github.com/WordPress/create-block-theme.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Create Block Theme in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the necessary Node.js and Composer dependencies for the Create Block Theme plugin development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
composer install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: WordPress Theme Metadata Block
DESCRIPTION: Theme metadata section defining version requirements, licensing, and basic theme information used by WordPress.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/tests/data/themes/test-theme-readme/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
=== Test Readme Theme ===
Contributors: wordpressdotorg
Requires at least: 6.5
Tested up to: 6.5
Requires PHP: 7.0
Stable tag: 2.1
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Theme Description Block
DESCRIPTION: Brief description section explaining the theme's purpose as a testing tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/tests/data/themes/test-theme-readme/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
== Description ==

Test Readme Theme is a test theme created with the sole purpose of testing the Create_Block_Theme_Readme class.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Theme Changelog Block
DESCRIPTION: Version history section documenting changes and updates made to the theme across different releases.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/tests/data/themes/test-theme-readme/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
== Changelog ==

= 1.0 =
* Initial release

= 1.1 =
* Added new feature

= 2.0 =
* Added new major feature

= 2.1 =
* Added new feature
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Theme Copyright Block
DESCRIPTION: Copyright and licensing information section detailing the GNU GPL terms under which the theme is distributed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/tests/data/themes/test-theme-readme/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
== Copyright ==

Test Readme Theme WordPress Theme, (C) 2023 WordPress.org
Test Readme Theme is distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
GNU General Public License for more details.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Theme Images License Block
DESCRIPTION: Image licensing section specifying the CC0 license and source information for theme assets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/create-block-theme/blob/trunk/tests/data/themes/test-theme-readme/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
=== Images ===

License: CC0 https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

museum.webp - https://www.rawpixel.com/image/3297419/free-photo-image-interior-hallway-architecture
tourist-and-building.webp - https://www.rawpixel.com/image/5928004/photo-image-public-domain-hand-person
```
